name: Persian GX
author: PLANETA Igarashi

abilities.name: Cat Walk
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if 1 of your Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX was Knocked Out during your opponent’s last turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. You can’t use more than 1 Cat Walk Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Vengeance
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Pokémon in your discard pile. You can’t add more than 180 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Slash Back GX
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
